[[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|Tales from the Perilous Realm (radio series)]] | imdb=[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0861429/ Profile] }} '''Stephen Thorne''' ([[1935]]-[[2019]]) was a renowned radio actor and audiobook narrator. His credits include [[Treebeard]] in BBC's ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings radio series]]'', Aslan in [[Brian Sibley]]'s radio version of [[C.S. Lewis]]' ''The Chronicles of Narnia'', and several characters in Doctor Who. ==Roles== * [[1981]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings (radio series)]]'' - [[Treebeard]] * [[1992]]: ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|Tales from the Perilous Realm (radio series)]]'' ** "Farmer Giles of Ham" - [[Chrysophylax]] ==External links== * {{WP|Stephen Thorne}} * [http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0861429/ Stephen Thorne] at IMDb [[Category:Actors and actresses|Thorne, Stephen]] [[Category:British people|Thorne, Stephen]] [[Category:People by name|Thorne, Stephen]]
